name: Radical Solitaire
description:
Never a bad deal. Always a RAD DEAL!

This is Radical Solitaire! You can GET RAD and swap a card with any face-down card any time you want. It's not always easy, but it's always winnable**... unlike regular boring loser solitaire like your dad plays.



Take a trip back to 1982 and waste a little time* with Radical Solitaire.

*best when played at work!
**Photosensitive folks: You can disable the flashing effect with [F6]
